name: Cult of Mathilda T-Shirt
description:
Introducing the exclusive Cult of Mathilda T shirt, a must-have for anyone who worships the interdimensional spider goddess. This shirt is standard issue to members of the cult and features intricate embroidery of runes on the sleeves, neckline, and waist hem. The small "Cult of Mathilda" logo on the front and impressive shoulder width embroidery on the back make a bold statement. Made from 100% cotton, this shirt is of the highest quality and weight available. The drop shoulder fit adds a streetwear edge to this unique piece. Join the cult and show your devotion with this one-of-a-kind t-shirt.

This item includes the storybook:  "The Cult of Mathilda"

name: Cult of Mathilda Apprentice's Handbook & Dice of Destiny
description:
The Cult of Mathilda Apprentices handbook is a spell book that contains a range of practical spells with detailed ingredients, incantations and evocative ideas. The handbook also includes roleplaying applications for each spell, making it perfect for use in a TTRPG. But that's not all - the handbook also comes with a set of runic dice, aptly named "The Dice of Destiny", which allow for randomized spellcasting and unique spell combos. This handbook is a must-have for any spider-worshiping member of the Cult of Mathilda.

This item includes the storybook: "The Cult of Mathilda"

name: Cult of Mathilda Storybook - Physical Copy
description: Embark on an epic adventure with the Cult of Mathilda storybook, featuring Felix, Fiona, and the Swordfish crew as they battle their way through evil forces to reach the legendary golden portal. This thrilling tale is filled with danger, mystery, and treacherous enemies at every turn. Watch as the crew fights for survival against the Jeweler's Guild's thugs and the shadowy cult who worship the Interdimensional Spider Queen known as the Cult of Mathilda. Will they make it to the portal alive? Find out in this captivating storybook.
collection: The Cult of Mathilda;Story Books Slider

name: Cult of Mathilda Beanie
description:
Introducing the Cult of Mathilda beanie, a perfect accessory for spider cultists and fantasy fashion enthusiasts alike. Made from high-quality acrylic, this beanie features intricate embroidery around the entire rim, showcasing the cult's signature runes. Named after the infamous "Cult of Mathilda," who wear these beanies as a symbol of their devotion to the interdimensional Spider Queen. Add a touch of dark magic to your outfit and boost your blessings with the Cult of Mathilda beanie. Join the cult and embrace the power of Mathilda today.


This item includes the storybook: "The Cult of Mathilda"

name: Terrific tiger sleeves
description:
Introducing our Tiger Hide Bell Sleeves, the perfect addition to any fantasy fashion ensemble. These sleeves are designed with a bold tiger print that will make you stand out in any crowd. The elastic bands ensure a comfortable and secure fit, while the bell shape adds a touch of elegance to your outfit. Available in two sizes, these sleeves are perfect for any body type. Add some fierce flair to your wardrobe with our Tiger Hide Bell Sleeves.

This  item includes the story book: 'The Cat Captain's Coffers'

name: Fiona's Cloth Collar
description:
Introducing Fiona's Cloth Collar, the perfect accessory to add a touch of enchantment to your outfit. Handmade with high-quality polyester, this collar is both durable and comfortable to wear. Its adjustable design ensures a perfect fit for any neck size. In our fantasy stories, this collar is worn by the enchantress Fiona Faund after she joins the crew of the Swordfish. Add a touch of magic to your wardrobe with Fiona's Cloth Collar.

This item includes the story book: "The Cat Captain's Coffers"

name: The Cult of Mathilda Trucker Hat
description:
Introducing The Cult of Mathilda Trucker hat, the ultimate accessory for fans of the interdimensional spider goddess. This hat is worn by the leaders of the cult, making it a must-have for any member or follower. With the bold statement "Spiders want me, Humans fear me" embroidered on the front, this hat is sure to turn heads. It is made of the highest quality materials and is one size fits all. The inside taping is adorned with magical runes, enhancing the mystical allure of this purple trucker hat.


This item includes the storybook: "The Cult of Mathilda"

name: Swordfish Sailor's “How much is enough?” Tricorn
description:
Become part of the Swordfish crew with our Sailor's “How much is enough?” Tricorn hat. Made from 100% wool, this high-quality hat features stylish tassels and is lined for added comfort. It's also adjustable and can be stretched for larger heads. But that's not all - it comes with a QR Code tag that links to our pirate song, "How Much Is Enough" on Spotify, so you can truly feel like part of the crew. Named after the legendary crew of the ship called "The Swordfish", led by the infamous "Cat Captain" Felix Fenclaw, this tricorn hat is the perfect addition to any pirate outfit.


This item includes the storybook: "The Cat Captain's Coffers"

name: 'Adaween, Gem of the Jungle' Storybook
description: Get lost in the exciting world of Adaween with the 'Adaween, Gem of the Jungle' storybook. Follow the daring pirates Felix Fenclaw and Fiona Faund as they embark on a mission to find the Golden Portal ruins. However, their quest is halted by a locked door, and the only way to get through is to obtain the key from the notorious Jeweler's Guild. This thrilling heist story will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end. Order your physical copy today and experience the adventure for yourself
collection: Adaween, the Gem of the Jungle;Story Books Slider

name: Captain Fenclaw's “How Much is Enough?” Tricorn Hat
description:
Sail the high seas in style with Captain Fenclaw's "How much is enough?" Tricorn. This iconic wool hat was worn by the infamous Cat Captain Felix Fenclaw himself, and is the perfect addition to any pirate ensemble. Handmade with the highest quality materials, the Tricorn is fully lined and adjustable for a comfortable fit. Plus, it features a unique QR code that links to our pirate anthem "How Much Is Enough?" on Spotify. Don't miss out on this must-have accessory for any swashbuckling adventure.

This item includes the storybook: "The Cat Captain's Coffers"

name: 'The Cat Captain's Coffers' Storybook
description: The Cat Captain's Coffers" is a captivating storybook that takes readers on a thrilling adventure with Felix Fenclaw, the fearless cat captain, on his quest to find the golden portal. Landing his ship at the harbor town of Kazan, he meets Fiona Faund, an enchantress and the owner of The Urchins Kiss tavern. The story follows their fateful encounter and how they first met, with Felix discovering Fiona's golden portal necklace and trying to recruit her to his crew.  This physical storybook is perfect for readers of who love fantasy and adventure tales. Join Felix and Fiona as they embark on an unforgettable journey in "The Cat Captain's Coffers.
collection: The Cat Captain's Coffers;Story Books Slider

name: The Jeweler's Guild Signet Ring
description:
Embark on an enchanting journey with The Jeweler's Guild Signet Ring.

 

 Inspired by the daring exploits of Felix and Fiona in the fabled jungle city of Adaween, this extraordinary ring holds the key to unlock the secrets of The Golden Portal—a lost ancient ruin obscured by the passage of time.

 

Imbued with the highest quality electroplated stainless steel, its intricate design reflects the native markings of Adaween, while the pure amethyst pyramid at its core radiates a mystical violet glow, a key that empowers you with clarity of mind and spiritual protection.

 

Encased in a meticulously crafted wooden box, The Jeweler's Guild Signet Ring embodies both modern sophistication and fantastical charm.

 

Let this extraordinary ring transport you to a world where destiny and adventure intertwine, guiding you towards the undiscovered wonders that lie beyond The Golden Portal.

This item includes the storybook: "Adaween, the Gem of the Jungle"
collection: Featured Slider;Adaween, the Gem of the Jungle

name: The Commander's Collar
description: Be the talk of the Swordfish in The Commander's Collar. This red and gold woven fabric choker has an adjustable closure with gold snaps. If you're looking to add a dash of flair to your uniform, this choker will fit like a starfish in a tidepool.

name: The Golden Portal Chain Necklace
description:
You've been searching everywhere for The Golden Portal Chain Necklace ever since you've heard the tales of Fiona Faund. This enchanted gold necklace is the key to your next adventure! Sure to take you places you've yet to imagine, let Fiona's gold metal choker be your guide. This gold chain necklace features a short, thick metal chain with a large engraved portal pendant. 

This item includes the storybook: "The Cat Captain's Coffers"

name: Sailor Fiona's Kilt of Kazan
description:
Hoist the sails and swab the deck in Sailor Fiona's Kilt of Kazan. Whether you’re travelling to an exotic land or meeting friends at your favorite bar,  is a beautiful statement piece that transforms any outfit. This damask mini skirt is made of high quality chenille fabric. It’s cream and gold paisley print exudes luxury and adventure. This high-waisted mini skirt features a flat front and is pleated in the back. It is fastened by adjustable gold buckle closures at the waist. This mini kilt also comes with a detachable gold chain.

This item includes the storybook: "The Cat Captain's Coffers"

name: Sailor Fiona's Bridge Deck Bustier Top
description:
Finish your rum before the captain sees! Enchant anyone you meet in Sailor Fiona's Bridge Deck Bustier Top. This corset top can be worn with or without the tiger print sleeves- increasing its versatility ten-fold. Made from high-quality chenille damask fabric, this crop tank top features a zip-back, adjustable straps with gold buckles and a lace-up front with large gold metal grommets. This cream corset and includes a matching choker. Lace up this pirate top with the gold chain it comes with or swap it out for a ribbon of your choice. 

This item includes the storybook: "The Cat Captain's Coffers"

name: Captain Fenclaw's Tiger Button Down -  Elven Cut
description:
Storm the shores in Captain Fenclaw's Tiger Button Down. This men's button down shirt is the purrrfect everyday luxury.  Featuring gold metal buttons and a slim-tailored fit, this shirt will awaken the fur-midable swashbuckler within. Pair this tiger print shirt with our Topsail Trousers, Palazzo Pants or Kilt of Kazan.   

 

The Elven Cut is our equivalent to your world's "Slim Fit" or "Slim Cut." We reccomend this cut for slender men who have broad shoulders and a slim waist. This shirt is cut much smaller around the waist than our Human Cut, giving it a sleek, tailored look. 

This item includes the storybook: "The Cat Captain's Coffers"

description: Get ready to sail the high seas in our Swordfish Sailor's Topsail Trousers. These men's pants are cut like a traditional straight leg jean but are made out of high-quality chenille fabric. These cream and gold pirate inspired pants feature two front and back pockets with a zipper and gold metal jean button closure with exclusive portal design. Pair them with our Tiger Button Down for a fantastic ensemble.

name: Swordfish Sailor's Overcoat
description:
These seas are rough and these nights are cold. Ye best be wearin' Swordfish Sailor's Overcoat. This cream and gold damask pirate coat is made of high quality chenille fabric, sure to protect you from the elements and impress even your worst enemies. Fitted with decorative gold buttons on either side, this standard issue tail coat is worn open in the front. With 4 panels and a mandarin collar, the coat was created for the sailor with passion in their veins and adventure in their heart.

This item includes the storybook: "The Cat Captain's Coffers"

name: Oil of The Urchin's Kiss
description:
"Explorers beware the Urchin's Kiss.

Many a night, there is something amiss.

Stay awhile, stay forever."

Beautifully intoxicating, the Oil of the Urchin's Kiss captures the essense of the eerie sea-side tavern for which it was named. This magical perfume oil includes a blend of rich, dark patchouli and floral damascus rose. Everyone will know your presence when you enter the room wearing this enchanting scent. Suitable for all genders and creatures alike, it smells slightly different on each individual.

This item includes the storybook: "The Cat Captain's Coffers"

name: The Storyteller’s Guild Silk Button Down
description:
"Truth be told,
How many truths
Can be sold,
For a few gold pieces."
 

Regale the crowd with tales of fancy, fiction and fantasy. This shirt, indeed, holds a story of its own. Made from the finest woven silk, this orange and turquoise button down shirt is iridescent and changes colors as you move. Featuring bronze metal buttons with a meander motif and gilded gold paisley cuffs, this patterned long sleeve shirt is sure to make a lasting impression on those you amuse. Enthrall everyone you meet with The Storyteller’s Guild Silk Button Down.

Read the story of the Merchant's of Adaween.

name: The Jeweler's Guild Silk Button Down
description:
"From mines to Kings,
For lovers and dreams,
We set the stones,
That all will see."

 

A master of both skill and finery, the Jeweler’s of Adaween create luxury from stone and dust. This purple and blue woven button down shirt is the statement piece you’ve been searching for. Made of iridescent silk material, this shirt shines and changes color as you move. Featuring gold metal buttons and gilded gold paisley cuffs, this shirt’s magical sheen can be seen from across the room. Engrave your presence wherever you go with The Jeweler’s Guild Silk Button Down.

name: The Vintner's Guild Silk Button Down
description:
"Uncork the world, 
And have your fill.
We’ll drain the cask.
No one likes an empty glass."

 

Maker of wine and thus merriment, the Vintner is both creator and purveyor of bacchanalia. The wearer of this deep purple and teal button down shirt is sure to be the centerpiece of any party. Made of iridescent silk material, this shirt shines and changes color as you move. Featuring gold metal buttons and gilded gold paisley cuffs, this shirt is the pinnacle of luxury.  Enjoy the fruits of your labor in The Vintner’s Guild Silk Button Down.

name: The Royal Herbalist's Batik Long Sleeve Shirt
description:
"Flame grass, Paiya leaves,
Corilian petals, and Guava trees.
Grind the gifts of the jungle,
Into Useful remedies."

 

While gathering spices and herbs, the Royal Herbalist is always concocting tinctures and elixirs in their mind. Majestic plants climb up and down this shirt with leaves and flowers of fuschia, purple and green, all outlined in metallic gold. Featuring hand-carved seashell buttons and floral mosaic cuffs, the details are what make this button down shirt stand out. Forage for your finest moments in the Royal Herbalist Batik Button Down.

name: The Puzzle Maker's Batik Long Sleeve Shirt
description:
"I have 100 eyes but only see from 2
I’m sometimes brown and sometimes blue
A sacred dance that all can see,
I’ll leave a mark; impressively."

 

Carving wooden trinkets aboard The Hibiscus Vessel is an intricate and exciting process for the Puzzle Maker. This geometric button down shirt is made from the finest batik fabric procured from the islands. Whether you’re called to wear this rainbow shirt buttoned all the way up to the collar or open and free-flowing, it’s sure to open up discussion wherever you go. This long sleeve shirt features hand-made black and white shell buttons and a subtle metallic sheen. Create or solve a mystery of your own in our Puzzle Maker Batik Button Down.

These silky pants feature a sexy gold exposed zipper with dangling portal charm. Versatile and silky, these tiger pants have just enough stretch for a night on the town or a dangerous escape...or BOTH!
